headline: American Tower price target lowered to $245 from $250 at JPMorgan
summary: JPMorgan lowered the firm’s price target on American Tower (AMT) to $245 from $250 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm reduced new leasing estimates for the tower companies ahead of earnings to reflect a more conservative approach due to the potential impact from EchoStar. A “modest” industry outlook is outweighed by the EchoStar/Dish overhang, but deals could be a positive catalyst for the tower stocks, the analyst tells investors in a research note.Claim 70% Off TipRanks Pre
